OOC: Finally school is over and so i'm a back!

bic: Razorwing didn't leave=
 time to Remus for an opinion, he already
had a plan. 

Razorwing: The parl=
iament, as you can see, is a circular building with
four entry : north, sou=
th, east, west. We have them surrounded but it
is a matter of time before t=
here back up pay us a little visit. We
cannot lead a frontal assault: they =
are to well covered. I hate this
but we're gonna need you two. You scrap he=
ap (he looked at Remus) you
seem's able to fly so you're going to enter fro=
m the north side of the
tower...

Remus: But there's no entry!

Razorwing :=
 If you cant even make an entry you're useless for me.

Remus : I wouldn't =
have said "enter" then.

Razorwing: (He look Remus in the eyes: time wasn't=
 to jokes.)We ENTER
(he stressed that word) in the building we're taking co=
ver and shoot
everthings. You HAVE to buy enough time for me to give then a=
 little
gift for the self proclame bastard. Your job Deadfur will be to pul=
l
off everybody at least 500 meters away from the parliament but only
AFTER=
 my order, or our exit from the building. We still don't know
what will hap=
pend with our guest or the building so the farest
possible. But if you move=
 my men before I said so the pression on the
front will give them enough me=
n to take us down both. 

I'm a clear?

Remus : How much time will we have?=


Razorwing: Not much.

Remus: I don't seems to have a choice do I?
